title: RADS Error - Could not connect to the HTTP server. DNS changes don't work. Reinstall doesn't work.
body:
Hi.
I know this is an old problem but mine is a tad different. 
I tried all of the solutions posted previously by members and senior members, changed DNS 8.8.4.4 8.8.8.8 went to DNS and flushed DNS. Also checked settings.cfg for any kind of misplaced data or wrong entries. Reinstalled too. So far nothing has worked :(.
If anyone has any kind of a solution for this please do share :D. Thank you for reading.

replies.body: Restart your router and it will be fine trust me turn it off then on again

The error your receiving may actually be due to a permissions issue with your OS that's blocking the game from loading properly.  Go over our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to make sure that access is allowed.  You can also use the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically configure your firewall settings as well.  Hope that helps!
